greeting: What can Roo do for you?

task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

aboutMe: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.
enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Roo wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Roo wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Roo wants to create a new file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Roo wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Roo viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Roo wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Roo recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Roo wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Roo viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Roo wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Roo wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Roo wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: Roo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Roo wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Roo wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Roo wants to finish this subtask

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows Roo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust.

readFiles.label: Read files and directories
readFiles.description: Allows access to read any file on your computer.

editFiles.label: Edit files
editFiles.description: Allows modification of any files on your computer.

executeCommands.label: Execute approved commands
executeCommands.description: Allows execution of approved terminal commands. You can configure this in the settings panel.

useBrowser.label: Use the browser
useBrowser.description: Allows ability to launch and interact with any website in a headless browser.

useMcp.label: Use MCP servers
useMcp.description: Allows use of configured MCP servers which may modify filesystem or interact with APIs.

switchModes.label: Switch modes
switchModes.description: Allows automatic switching between different modes without requiring approval.

subtasks.label: Create & complete subtasks
subtasks.description: Allow creation and completion of subtasks without requiring approval.

retryRequests.label: Retry failed requests
retryRequests.description: Automatically retry failed API requests when the provider returns an error response.
